1245700.name: The Lost Legends of Redwall™: Escape the Gloomer: Soundtrack
1245700.description:
The epic music of The Lost Legends of Redwall : The Scout is now available in this official soundtrack.

This Soundtrack includes all 8 original tunes from the game, in both .MP3 and .WAV format.

Tracks:

  • Oubliette's & Otters by James Marantette
  • Blind as a Rat by James Marantette
  • Living off the Larder by James Marantette
  • Snakes, Rats, and Wildcats by James Marantette
  • The Final Confrontation by James Marantette
  • Gillig's Return by James Marantette
  • Oubliette's & Otters Reprise by James Marantette
  • We've Got Each Otter's Back by James Marantette
